snippet.title: IPECAC Community Mod: V1.3 - A Monster of an Update - COMING SOON!
snippet.description:
Something wicked this way comes!
The latest update for the IPECAC Community Mod is on the way! Full of new enemies, remakes of old ones, a handful of new items and trinkets, and numerous tweaks, changes, performance improvements, and all around polish, the latest update is our biggest and best yet -- and we think it shows!
When it drops, it will be available here:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1925867065

As always, this has been the IPECAC Community Mod, made by Team IPECAC. For more info about us (and even to download whatever version of the mod you want without using the workshop), you can take a look at our website:
https://ipecaccommunitymod.wordpress.com/
And, to know in detail about the mod's features and mechanics, we have a work-in-progress wiki:
https://ipecacmod.gamepedia.com/The_Binding_of_Isaac:_IPECAC_Wiki
We also have a twitter:
https://twitter.com/ipecaccommod
Our Discord server is probably one of the best ways to keep in touch and suggest improvements and give us feedback:
https://discord.gg/Jzt9REK
